api_list.name: Search Data
api_list.description: Data also referred as case is searched using this api
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mongodb-wix.p.rapidapi.com/searchcases/Casetype=car"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mongodb-wix.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mongodb-wix.p.rapidapi.com/searchcases/{filter}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mongodb-wix.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Tenant
api_list.description: Use this call to get the Tenant name, This name will be used in the configuration section on wix. e.g. {"Yauthtenantname":"<TENANT_NAME>"}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mongodb-wix.p.rapidapi.com/tenant"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mongodb-wix.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Schema By Name

        }

api_list.name: Search All Schemas
api_list.description: This call returns all schemas and its definition. Schemas are also called as case types. These case types will be consumed in Wix Database as Schemas.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mongodb-wix.p.rapidapi.com/casetype/search/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mongodb-wix.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Tenant By Id
Update Vault By Id
api_list.description: Update existing vault encrypt with key and safe keep text. Use search all to get the _id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mongodb-wix.p.rapidapi.com/vault/611876005a2764edbc925b75"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mongodb-wix.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mongodb-wix.p.rapidapi.com/vault/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mongodb-wix.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Update data
Update Tenant DB Connection
api_list.description: Use this api to update database connection string to save data into your own database.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mongodb-wix.p.rapidapi.com/tenant/61185cd9141a6d579660e04m"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mongodb-wix.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Connect to Wix
api_list.description: This api will connect your Rapid api account to your implementation

required_parameters.name: rapidapikey
required_parameters.description: This is your Rapid API Key (X-RapidAPI-Key)

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is the Tenant _id. Use Get Tenant API to get your tenant's _id
